Ability.Name: -- Hotkeys --
Ability.Lua:
if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime()
if StopRota then
StopRota = false print("Rotation reenabled!")
else
StopRota = true print("Rotation stopped!")
end end

Ability.Name: -- Start Fight --
Ability.Lua: if StopRota or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") or IsMounted() or UnitChannelInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitCastingInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitBuff("player", "Drink") or UnitBuff("player", "Food") then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Offensive Spells --
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil or ( not UnitAffectingCombat("target") and not UnitIsPlayer("target") ) then return true end

Ability.Name: Use:Mouseover Skill
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") and IsMouseButtonDown() then RunMacroText("/click "..GetMouseFocus():GetName()) end

Ability.Name: All:Poison
Ability.Lua:
if applypoison and GetTime() - applypoison > 4 then applypoison = nil end if UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil and applypoison == nil then
local activepoisons = { "43231", "43233" } local _,poisonMH,_,_,poisonOH,_,_,poisonTR = GetWeaponEnchantInfo() applypoison = GetTime()
if poisonMH == nil then UseItemByName(activepoisons[1],"player") if SpellIsTargeting() then PickupInventoryItem(16) end elseif poisonOH == nil then UseItemByName(activepoisons[2],"player") if SpellIsTargeting() then PickupInventoryItem(17) end end
end

Ability.Name: All:Tricks of the Trade
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("focus") and (not UnitIsDeadOrGhost("focus")) and UnitExists("focus") then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Stealth
Ability.Lua: if IsStealthed() == nil and IsMounted() == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Combat:Adrenaline Rush
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Mutilate", "target") == 1 and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Combat:Eviscerate
Ability.Lua: if GetComboPoints("player", "target") >= 4 and IsSpellInRange("Sinister Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Combat:Sinister Strike
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Sinister Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Combat:Blade Flurry
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Mutilate", "target") == 1 and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Combat:Killing Spree
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Mutilate", "target") == 1 and UnitBuffID("player", 13750) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Assas:Hunger For Blood
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player", 51662) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Assas:Garrote
Ability.Lua:
local Stealthed = UnitBuffID("player", 1784)
if Opener == true and IsStealthed() and IsSpellInRange("Garrote", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Assas:Cold Blood
Ability.Lua: if GetComboPoints("player", "target") >= 5 then return true end

Ability.Name: Assas:Envenom
Ability.Lua: if GetComboPoints("player", "target") >= 4 and UnitBuffID("player", 57993) == nil and IsSpellInRange("Mutilate", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Assas:Mutilate
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Mutilate", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Assas:Slice and Dice
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player", 6774) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Assas:Rupture
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target", 48672, "player") == nil and GetComboPoints("player", "target") >= 4 and IsSpellInRange("Sinister Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Assas:Expose Armor
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target", 8647, "player") == nil and GetComboPoints("player", "target") >= 4 and IsSpellInRange("Mutilate", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Combat:Fan of Knives
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftShiftKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: -- DarhangeR --
Ability.Lua: -- I'm the original developer of dat profiles. Any changes, copying or sharing without my knowledge direct copyright infringement. For more info: -- VK: https://vk.com/darhanger -- FB: https://fb.com/darhanger -- E-mail: civayan@gmail.com

Ability.Name: Racial:Berserking
Ability.Lua: if UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Racial:Blood Fury
Ability.Lua:
if UnitLevel("target") == -1 then CastSpellByID(33697) end
if UnitLevel("target") == -1 then CastSpellByID(20572) end

Ability.Name: -- Autotarget --
All:Vanish
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player", 58426) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Asas:-- Hotkeys --
Ability.Lua:
if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime()
if StopRota then
StopRota = false print("Rotation reenabled!")
else
StopRota = true print("Rotation stopped!")
end end
if not rightkeydown then rightkeydown = 0 end
if IsLeftAltKeyDown() and GetTime() - rightkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime()
if Opener then
Opener = false print("Ambush opener enabled!")
else
Opener = true print("Garrote opener enabled!")
end end

Ability.Name: Assas:Ambush(S)
Ability.Lua:
local Stealthed = UnitBuffID("player", 1784)
if Opener == false and IsStealthed() and IsSpellInRange("Ambush", "target") == 1 then return true end
